short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Locate DOM and Shadow DOM elements and provide their locators.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ShadowPilot is a browser extension designed to help developers and testers locate and generate robust locators for DOM and Shadow DOM elements in web applications. It focuses on simplifying element identification, especially in complex Shadow DOM structures, by providing AI-enhanced locators, seamless framework integration, and exportable code snippets for automation
